subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, who have not won an N.B.A. title in three decades, will open their preseason schedule Oct. 11 against Maccabi Tel Aviv, a club that has won 47 Israeli championships.
snippet: The Knicks, who have not won an N.B.A. title in three decades, will open their preseason schedule Oct. 11 against Maccabi Tel Aviv, a club that has won 47 Israeli championships.
